items.content:
We are excited to share our recent journey in London, which was made possible by the support of the Tokyo Metropolitan Government. As one of the top 10 Japanese startups in the X-Hub Tokyo Global Startup Accelerator's UK Outbound program, our experience was truly transformative.

We're immensely grateful to everyone who supported our journey - the Tokyo Metropolitan Government, JETRO - Japan External Trade Organization , L Marks, and our fellow visionaries at SOLIT, Inc., IDDK Co., Ltd., Elephantech Inc., datagusto, Thermalytica Inc., Dioseve, TKG Therapeutics, Inc., Gigalogy, and BoostDraft. 

Onward and upward 🚀

meta.name: Impactly
meta.mission: At Impactly, we believe in the power of diversity and the strength that comes from understanding and inclusion. Our mission is to help organizations embrace neurodiversity and diversity, transforming workplaces into spaces where every individual feels valued, understood, and empowered. Through education, training, and advocacy, we aim to redefine standard corporate cultures, promoting an environment that celebrates differences and drives innovation. Our ultimate goal is to forge a more inclusive, understanding, and equitable future for all in the corporate world.

items.content:
Elephantech is seeking a Business Development Specialist to lead their growth in the Electric Vehicle (EV) market in Europe, with a specific focus on Flexible Printed Circuits (FPC) for Battery Management Systems (BMS). This vital role involves exploring and developing the EV BMS market across Europe, utilizing their environmentally friendly FPC products.

**Key Details:**

- **Location:** Europe
- **Industry:** Automotive, Battery
- **Employment Type:** Contractual, starting with an initial 3-month contract and potential for long-term engagement based on business performance
- **Work Commitment:** Approximately 60 hours per month (flexibility in scheduling to be discussed)
- **Compensation:** ~$5,000 USD per month

If you're driven to excel in the EV sector and have the necessary experience in business development, Elephantech invites you to apply. Click the link to learn more and take the first step towards a rewarding career with Elephantech!

https://app.socious.io/jobs/65b981b2-da68-4e92-b671-4b0d91b38d85

items.content:
Play Tarochi and Help Preserve the Ancient Art of Aizome Dyeing #Tarochi4Aizome

In a unique collaboration, Paima Studio, Cardano BCG, and Socious are excited to announce a giveaway campaign that will help preserve the ancient art of Aizome, a traditional Japanese indigo dyeing technique.

This campaign combines the best of both worlds: the cutting-edge technology of blockchain gaming with the timeless beauty of traditional craftsmanship. By playing Paima's exciting blockchain game, Tarochi, and providing feedback, you can contribute to the preservation of Aizome and help train a new generation of traditional craftsmen.

Campaign Prizes:

- Tarochi Improvement Prize: 1000 ADA, 300 ADA, and 100 ADA for the first, second, and third place winners, respectively, as well as an NFT of a Japanese Aizome Handkerchief.
- Tarochi Achievement Prize: 1000 ADA, 300 ADA, and 100 ADA for the first, second, and third place winners, respectively, as well as an NFT of a Japanese Aizome Handkerchief.
- Socious Retweet Prize: 1000 ADA, 300 ADA, and 100 ADA for the first, second, and third place winners, respectively, as well as an NFT of a Japanese Aizome Handkerchief.
- Participation Prize & Lottery: Each of the first 100 participants will receive 10 ADA, and five people will be randomly chosen to receive an NFT of a Japanese Aizome handkerchief.

How to Participate:

1. Visit [socious.io/blog/play-tarochi-and-help-preserve-the-ancient-art-of-aizome-dyeing](http://socious.io/blog/play-tarochi-and-help-preserve-the-ancient-art-of-aizome-dyeing) to learn more about the campaign and how to participate.
2. Play Tarochi and provide feedback on [Paima Studio's Discord]
3. Submit your results before 2023-12-23 23:59 JST.

Join us in this exciting campaign to preserve a cherished cultural heritage!

#PlayAndEarn #BlockchainGaming #Aizome #CulturalHeritage

Link for full details: http://socious.io/blog/play-tarochi-and-help-preserve-the-ancient-art-of-aizome-dyeing

items.content:
募集内容は以下の通りです。

Hiring TikTokers for Cardano Asia & ProSkills39 - Blockchain Division

Cardano Asia is looking for TikTokers passionate about Blockchain to join our team. We invite you to join us in spreading knowledge about Blockchain to the Japanese community. If you love Blockchain technology and aspire to become a talented TikToker, please see the detailed requirements below:

Requirements:

Fluency in Japanese: You need to have the ability to communicate fluently in Japanese to interact with the Japanese community.

Ability to translate from English to Japanese: To accurately convey information about Blockchain, you need to have the ability to translate from English to Japanese. Cardano Asian will provide English script materials for you.

Create videos in Japanese: You will be responsible for creating videos on topics related to Blockchain in Japanese.

Submit original video clips: You will provide the original video clips to our team for review and editing.

Commit to 3-4 video clips per week: You must create at least 3-4 weekly video clips for six months.

Salary: Negotiable. Per Video or Month,

We hope you will help us spread knowledge about Blockchain and promote understanding of this technology within the Japanese community. Join us on this journey! 🚀

identity_meta.name: Cardano Asia TikTok Channel
identity_meta.address: Room 409 C1 Apartment, Tan Vinh Street, Ward 6, District 4

items.content:
Today is the International Day Against Violence and Bullying at School Including Cyberbullying. Let's come together to create safer environments for everyone, both online and offline.

#StopBullying #NoViolenceInSchools 

Schools should be sanctuaries, places where young minds can grow and thrive without fear. Sadly, that's not always the case. Physical violence, emotional abuse, and cyberbullying have been part of many students' daily lives.

Did you know? One in every three students has been bullied at school, and about the same number have been bullied online. (https://www.childrenshospital.org/conditions/bullying)

Bullying can have long-term, significant effects according to recent studies:

- Over 70% of young adults who were bullied in their youth experience increased levels of anxiety and depression well into adulthood. (Hawker, D.S.J. and Boulton, M.J. (2000) **Twenty Years' Research on Peer Victimization and Psychosocial Maladjustment**)
- About 60% of adults who were bullied as children report a negative impact on their self-esteem, affecting their relationships, career, and overall well-being. (https://www.ncbi.nlm.nih.gov/pmc/articles/PMC4552909/)
- 1 in 3 students who have been bullied in school continue to suffer from psychological and emotional distress years after the bullying has stopped (https://www.childrenshospital.org/conditions/bullying)

🛡️ Let's stand together to #EndBullyingNow. Here are some ways you can help:

1️⃣ Educate - Know the signs and types of bullying.
2️⃣ Communicate - Talk openly about the issues.
3️⃣ Activate - Be more than a bystander; intervene when safe to do so.
4️⃣ Report - Use school and online mechanisms to report incidents.

🌐 It starts with one. Be that one.
The following organizations are doing a great job in the fight against bullying:

@STOMPoutBullying
@PACER_NBPC
@DitchtheLabel
@CybersmileHQ

Resources: 
https://www.childrenshospital.org/conditions/bullying 
https://kidshealth.org/en/kids/bullies.html
https://www.stopbullying.gov/

 #InternationalDayAgainstViolenceAndBullyingAtSchool #StopBullying #SafeSpacesForAll #OnlineAndOffline

We're delighted to share that Socious has secured funding from Singularity NET as part of their Deep Funding Deep Funding initiative! This support is a major boost that will empower us to further our mission of connecting purpose-driven professionals with impact organizations. 

This partnership is a significant step towards making a positive change in the world, and we're eager to embrace the opportunities it brings. Thank you for being a part of our journey, and stay tuned for more updates on how we'll be working together to drive positive impact!

#Socious #SingularityNET #DeepFunding #ImpactMatters

items.content:
🚀 Happy Ada Lovelace Day! 🎉


On this special day, we pay tribute not only to the incredible mathematician Ada Lovelace but also to the groundbreaking cryptocurrency Cardano (ADA), named in her honor. 🌟


Ada Lovelace, a visionary thinker of the 19th century, laid the foundation for modern computer programming with her pioneering work. Today, her legacy lives on in the world of blockchain and cryptocurrency through Cardano. 🌐💰


Just like Ada Lovelace pushed the boundaries of what was possible in her time, Cardano is pushing the boundaries of blockchain technology, bringing innovation, sustainability, and inclusivity to the forefront. 💡🌿


Let's celebrate this synergy of the past and the future! 🎩🚀 Share your love for Ada Lovelace, ADA, and the endless possibilities they represent in the world of blockchain. 🙌💻


#AdaLovelaceDay #Cardano #ADA #Blockchain #Cryptocurrency #Innovation #Sustainability #FutureTech #Trailblazers #CryptoCommunity

meta.name: Lime
meta.mission: Lime is the world's largest shared electric vehicle company. We’re on a mission to build a future where transportation is shared, affordable and carbon-free. Named a Time 100 Most Influential Company in 2021, Lime has powered 350+ million electric bike and scooter rides in 200+ cities on 5 continents, saving an estimated 75+ million car trips. Learn more about how we help the world #RideGreen at li.me!
